Package server

Class DataBase

java.lang.Object
server.DataBase
public class DataBase
extends java.lang.Object
this is the class where everything is saved and sent to the client side in order to synchronize the client with the server. some methods are only updates and some are for returning a value which is likely to be a list. (the lists and the variables are also thread - safe).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    DataBase()

  • Constructor Details

    • DataBase

      public DataBase()

  • Method Details

    • initializeServer

      public static void initializeServer()
      this method reads the db from the file and creates the db file if it's not created. it also reads the id of the posts from the file.

    • login

      public static void login​(java.io.ObjectOutputStream objectOutputStream, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      this method searches the list of users in order to check if the username and password entered for logging in is valid. if the info is not valid then it sends notApproved message to the client. it it is then it sends the user who wants to sign in with to the client
      Parameters:
      objectOutputStream - the stream needed to write objects
      username - username of the user
      password - password of the user.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

    • signupUpdate

      public static ApprovedType signupUpdate​(User user)
      this method signs up a new user and saves it into the db the only thing which is not checked in the client is that if the username is already used or not which is checked here
      Parameters:
      user - the new user which we are trying to save in the db.
      Returns:
      the return type declares if the signUp process was successful or not.

    • updatePost

      public static void updatePost​(Post post, java.lang.String user)
      this method adds a new post to the list of the posts of a user.
      Parameters:
      post - the new post added to the list
      user - owner of the post

    • loadPost

      public static User loadPost​(User requester, User requested)
      this method loads the posts need for each page therefore it fins the owner of the posts and returns it to the client.
      Parameters:
      requester - this param is needed for checking if the user is blocked or not
      requested - the user whom se want to load his / her posts.
      Returns:
      the value is a list of posts of the user.

    • retrievePass

      public static User retrievePass​(User user)
      method for retrieving the password of a user

    • saveNewPass

      public static boolean saveNewPass​(User user)
      this method checks if the answer to the security question was valid or not. if yes then the new pass is saved. otherwise nothing happens.
      Parameters:
      user - the user who is searching for his / her password.
      Returns:
      its false or true according to the answer of the user to the security question.

    • search

      public static User search​(java.lang.String username)
      this method is for the search page controller which gives a username and sends the user of it to the client.
      Parameters:
      username - the name of the searched user.
      Returns:
      return value is null if the user is not found in the list and a user if the username is found.

    • addAndSendComments

      public static java.util.Vector<Comment> addAndSendComments​(java.lang.String user, Post post, Comment comment)
      this method adds a comment to the list of comments and then sends the list of the comments back to the client
      Parameters:
      user - the user whom posted the comment.
      post - the post the user is commenting on
      comment - the comment the user committed
      Returns:
      a list which contains the comments of the post.

    • sendComments

      public static java.util.Vector<Comment> sendComments​(java.lang.String user, Post post)
      this method sends the list of comments of a post
      Parameters:
      user - the owner of the post which has the list of comments
      post - the post which we want its comments
      Returns:
      the list of comments

    • follow

      public static java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger follow​(User following, User follower)
      this method adds the new follower by adding the username of the follower to list of the following's followers and adding the username of the following to the list of the follower's followings.
      Parameters:
      following - the user who is being followed
      follower - the follower
      Returns:
      return value is the num of the followers of the followed user. the return value is -1 if the follower is blocked by the following.

    • unfollow

      public static java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger unfollow​(User unFollowing, User unFollower)
      the same method as the follow method but reversed.
      Parameters:
      unFollowing - the user who is being unfollowed
      unFollower - the unFollower.
      Returns:
      return value is the new num of followers

    • loadFollowingPosts

      public static java.util.Vector<Post> loadFollowingPosts​(User user)
      this method is exclusively for the timeline feed and returns the posts of the users whom the user followed
      Parameters:
      user - the user who wants his / her list of followings' posts.
      Returns:
      a list which contains the list of the followings' post.

    • like

      public static void like​(User user, Post post)
      this method is user for adding the number of likes to a post but the problem is the reposted posts which their like numbers should be added so we find those in a loop,too.
      Parameters:
      user - the user who wants to like the post
      post - the post which is being liked.

    • dislike

      public static void dislike​(User user, Post post)
      same as the like method but reversed
      Parameters:
      user - the user who wants to take back his like
      post - the target post which its likes is bout to be reduced.

    • updateUser

      public static User updateUser​(java.lang.String username)
      don't remember what the hell this is :|.

    • repost

      public static ApprovedType repost​(User user, Post post)
      this method is the worst method of my project but at least im proud i did it^_^. well it receives the user who wants to repost and the target post. now the num of reposts of the post is added and the user is added to the reposters of the post. so the next time the user wants to repost the post the db checks if the user has already reposted the post or not. it also checks if the user doesn't want to repost his / her own post. in the end it searches the likes of the post in other places and replaces the new repost(with more num of reposts) in the whole db.
      Parameters:
      user - the user who wants to repost
      post - the target post to repost.
      Returns:
      return value is like a true or false which shows the success in the process.

    • settingUpdate

      public static void settingUpdate​(User user)
      this method receives a user and updates its information in the whole db.(comments,posts,...).
      Parameters:
      user - the user who is updated.

    • deleteAccount

      public static void deleteAccount​(User deletedUser)
      this method is for deleting accounts and consists of deleting different parts which are related to the deleted user.
      Parameters:
      deletedUser - is the user whom the user tends to delete.

    • mute

      public static void mute​(User muter, User muted)
      the method for muting a user

    • unMute

      public static void unMute​(User unMuter, User unMuted)
      the method for unMuting a user

    • block

      public static void block​(User blocker, User blocked)
      the method for blocking a user. if you block a user then you are no longer his / her follower so the num of the followers of the blocked user reduces.

    • unBlock

      public static void unBlock​(User unBlocker, User unblocked)
      the method for blocking a user.

    • createChatItem

      public static void createChatItem​(User chatSender, User chatReceiver)
      this method is for creating an item which allows the user to chat with the searchedUser. this item which is created here will be available in the direct section.
      Parameters:
      chatSender - the user who wants to chat with another user
      chatReceiver - the addressed user.

    • getUsers

      public static java.util.Vector<UserList> getUsers​(User myUser)
      this method is for finding the list of users our main user has chatted with.
      Parameters:
      myUser - the user who is controlling the app
      Returns:
      the list of users which we want.

    • loadMessages

      public static java.util.Vector<Message> loadMessages​(java.lang.String myUsername, java.lang.String theOtherUsername)
      this method is for loading messages of a chat.
      Parameters:
      myUsername - the user who is controlling the app.
      theOtherUsername - the user we are chatting with.
      Returns:
      a list of all messages sent and received

    • sendMessage

      public static java.util.Vector<Message> sendMessage​(Message message)
      this method adds a message to the database of a chat between two users and then returns a newList consisting of all the chats.
      Parameters:
      message - newMessage which is bout to be added.
      Returns:
      the return value is a list of chats.

    • deleteMessage

      public static void deleteMessage​(Message deletedMessage)
      this method is for deleting a message from the database of the messages between two users. but it seems that there is a bug in java FX listView so change of plans! the message isn't actually deleted but its boolean is set to true so the graphic changes when it is deleted.
      Parameters:
      deletedMessage - the message which is bout to be deleted.

    • editMessage

      public static void editMessage​(Message editedMessage, java.lang.String editedText)
      this method is for editing an existing message. the old message message and the new text is sent and is replaced with the old one.
      Parameters:
      editedMessage - the message we tend to edit
      editedText - the new text of the message.

    • searchChat

      public static User searchChat​(User searcher, java.lang.String username)
      this method is for searching the user whom we want to chat with.

    • sendPicMessage

      public static java.util.Vector<Message> sendPicMessage​(PicMessage picMessage)
      this method is like sendMessage method but it adds a picMessage instead of a normal Message.
      Parameters:
      picMessage - the message we want to add to the database.
      Returns:
      the list of messages between two users.
